stripped_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. Subroutine Do 2 net damage unless the Runner pays 3 credits. Subroutine Do 2 net damage unless the Runner jacks out.
text:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage unless the Runner jacks out.
title: Lionsmane
